name: Hidden Cultist
description:
Cultists of a forgotten God roam in your villages and sacrifice your faithful citizens at night! Help your Citizens’ teamwork in finding the cultists indirectly! Punish cultists with your divine might, before they complete their fell ritual and gain bad superpowers! 

Hidden Cultist - our godlike social deduction game 

currently exists in resolution 1920 x 1080 exclusively, due to development on short notice. Should your system tend to "smart" automatic resolution adjustments [cough]windows10[/cough*] Better adjust that manually and spare you some angry moments.
